valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 25 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 26 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Lows southeast Rockall 987 and Plymouth 986 losing their identities

Wintry showers.

In north, easterly or southeasterly 3 to 5. In south, easterly or southeasterly backing northeasterly, 4 to 6, occasionally 7 later.

In north, wintry showers. In south, occasional snow.

Good, occasionally poor. Light icing later in south.
